medical_history.chief_complaint: Nausea, dizziness, and several episodes of non-bilious vomiting.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began around ___ when he reports starting to have nausea, dizziness, and episodes of vomiting. On ___ he experienced "shifting" abdominal pain, prompting a request for transfer for further evaluation. Duration of symptoms and any specific changes over time are not detailed.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, left eye blindness, history of descending thoracic aneurysm s/p TEVAR complicated by a graft leak and thoracic aortic aneurysm rupture, bilateral cerebellar and cerebral hemisphere acute infarctions, T6/T7 vertebral body infarction resulting in lower extremity paraplegia.
